bug.author: Code4SAFrankie
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Running streamlit hello gives the error 404: Not Found <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run streamlit hello in the directory of my python.exe <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Expected a streamlit application to launch <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
The urls http://192.168.1.34:8501/ and http://localhost:8501 both return 404: Not Found <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.47.2 Python version: 3.7.1 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? pip on WinPython OS version: Windows 10 version 1903 Browser version: Firefox 69.0
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Turns out it was due to running jupyter-lab at the same time.

Thanks for debugging this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Code4SAFrankie>@Code4SAFrankie</denchmark-link> and welcome to the community! If you have the chance, we'd love some context so that other users don't run into this problem. Thanks!
Closed jupyter-lab but still getting 404 error....

Closed jupyter-lab but still getting 404 error....
If you are on Windows, try this URL and see: <denchmark-link:http://localhost:8501/index.html>http://localhost:8501/index.html</denchmark-link>
